title: Apprenticeship: I wasn't made to be a secretary
creator_credit: Film Australia, Elisabeth Knight and David Haythornthwaite
brief_description: Girls who have chosen to serve apprenticeships in such areas as stonemasonry, automotive mechanics and painting discuss why they decided on these traditionally male dominated stress. Suitable for secondary level.
